( Carnage: I am replying early this morning for the reason that I shall be 
out this weekend, or until Saturday afternoon.  I will not have access to a 
computer until then. May you all have a happy wekend, and post well.)

** Vlad looked down at Shesta as she continued to growl, shushing her with 
the glance. The animal simply then sitting down, looking straight ahead 
towards Havoc.
But when Vlad turned his attention beck towards the man he heard something 
which puzzled him.
Alliance? What as that?
The last he had heard was that there were simply Maximals and Predacons. 
Perhaps this Alliance...as it sounded, was both?
He knew that he would eventually find out sooner or later, but sooner was 
more to his liking.
Though, there was something about this ship that Vlad hadn't noticed right 
away after escaping from that infernal pod, there was basically no one 
there.
There were no sights nor sounds of bots, nothing but the hum of computers 
and automated devices.
Where were they all?
Though...perhaps Havoc could answer a question or two?
But then Vlad growled in thought. There were more important things at hand 
then simply dallying around with this man. He had to find Von...and...maybe 
Havoc knew where he was located.
Perhaps this man might come in handy after all.
Vlad cleared his throat.**

" My name's Vlad."

** He gestured down towards the dog/wolflike creature at his heels.**

" This is Shesta."

** But then Vlads attention returned to Havoc.**

" My faction is Predacon, and my mission is to locate my brother, Von.  
I...have information which needs to get to him, quickly."
